description: This skill requires the skill to analyze and optimizie site speed
This skill requires the ability to perform a technical seo analysis of a page and to implement improvements and fixes
This skill requires the ability to use aHrefs to produce a prospect list of email addresses for the purposes of building links for a particualr piece of content
This skill requires the ability to take a list of email addresses and create a reasonably sophisticated email campaign in MailShake
This skill requires the ability to read and understand a piece of content and write a script that presents the content visually through video
This skill requires the ability to read and record a voice over script
This skill requires the ability to read a script and film the live action portions of the script
This skill requires the ability to combine a script, voice over and filmed content and produce it into a final, produced video ready for uploading

This requires the ability to watch a video and optimize the various settings used for uploading a YouTube video, including hashtags and other tasks required to increase the chance the video will rank.
This skill requires the ability to upload a YouTube video
This requires the ability to modify HTML at a text markup level.
